body.name: Bobtot Portable Bluetooth Speakers with Strap Easy to Carry, Wireless Waterproof Mini Speaker with Loud Stereo Sound,15 Hours Playtime, Rechargeable Battery, Built-In Microphone, Pink

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 31 mins
features: Bluetooth Wireless Connection: The portable speaker can connect to devices from up to 33 feet away without obstructions. Bluetooth 5.0 technology, ensures a more stable and extended wireless range for all Bluetooth-enabled devices, such as laptops, iPhones, iPads, computers, and TVs. Even in challenging conditions, the speakers bluetooth wireless can maintain a reliable connection and undisturbed signal transmission

Amazing Bass Loud Sound: The wireless speaker delivers 5W stereo sound with a well-balanced midrange, crisp treble, and punchy bass, all with no distortion. It provides an immersive sound experience with rich bass, clear mids and highs, and dynamic sound. The exceptional sound quality of this wireless speaker remains distortion-free even at maximum volume. The waterproof bluetooth speaker delivers surprisingly loud and clear stereo sound, even when used in the presence of showering noise

Incredible Playtime and Extended Battery Life: The speaker bluetooth is equipped with a 1200mAh rechargeable battery and features a power-saving mode, ensuring an impressive playtime of up to 15 hours on a full charge. You can enjoy uninterrupted music from day to night without any interruptions. Additionally, the battery is designed for long-lasting performance and can be used repeatedly for several years

Hands-Free Function and Waterproof: The blue tooth speaker features a built-in microphone that enables hands-free calling, allowing you to have conversations without holding your phone. It is incredibly convenient for making calls while cooking, driving, gardening, or even taking a shower. The wireless Bluetooth speaker is waterproof and rainproof. It can withstand water and liquid splashes. Perfect for biking, hiking, camping, and kayaking

Lightweight Portable Speaker: This small speaker weighs less than 0.5 pounds, is incredibly lightweight. It is even smaller than a phone and comes with a convenient strap-to-anything lanyard, easy to hang it on your handbag, backpack, car, or bike effortlessly. This mini speaker is not only a wireless speakers with bluetooth but also a fashion accessory. its light and smooth round body add to its appeal as a stylish fashion accessory. Its attractive design makes it an excellent choice as a gift

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bobtot Portable Bluetooth Speakers Waterproof Wireless Speaker with Loud Sound
Stable Connection Bluetooth 5.0, 33 Feet Wireless Range
Long Press the Volume Button to Adjust the Volume

How do I connect my Bluetooth portable speaker to my phone/ tablet/ computer or TV? Turn on the portable speaker. Enable Bluetooth on your device such as your phone. Search for the Bluetooth name "Cutie" on your phone to initiate the pairing process. if your device is TV/computer, make sure they are Bluetooth-enabled How long does the battery of the Bluetooth portable speaker last? The battery life of a Bluetooth speaker depends on the volume. The wireless speakers can work for 15 hours at 70% volume per full charge. If the speaker remains in standby mode for a long time without playing, it will shut off for power-saving. If the speaker has not been used for six months or more, does it need to be recharged when i take it out again? The battery doesn't drain quickly but rather discharges slowly. If the speaker is not used for a long time, it will gradually decrease its battery capacity. Recommended to charge the speaker as the battery can be recharged and used repeatedly Is it possible to pair multiple Bluetooth devices with a portable speaker simultaneously? No. How can I enhance the volume or improve the audio quality of my Bluetooth portable speaker? To increase the volume, please long press the volume+. To improve audio quality, keep the speaker away from interference sources. If you have questions or you are unsatisfied. Please refer to the user manual for customer-service information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, nice sound
reviews.reviewText: This thing can get loud! I love it. I use it in my bathroom while I'm showering and it's perfect. Plus the color is so pretty. Doesn't take up much space either as it's fairly small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little speaker. I have used it around water, where it has been splashed, and haven't had any issues. The sound quality is great and charges quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS SPEAKER!
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these for each of my kids for the holidays. I liked it so much that I ordered one for myself! Perfect for using inside or taking with you to the fire pit or beach. Sound is great for it's size. Accidentally left it outside overnight after a gathering at the firepit and it got RAINED on for a couple hours. It still worked just fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great sound quality! LOOONG battery life! Very easy to use. Connected to my device effortlessly. Very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not loud enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its cute and kind of loud…. No volume controls on the speaker. Volume is controlled from your device. Does what i need when i need. Handles phone calls, so its better than the misleading ear buds i purchased. Over all it works as required, but there are better options if you want to spend more and want more features - like volume control beyond your phone/tablet restrictions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Qq This little jewel and I emphasize little has incredible sound. I’m 50% deaf so I was having difficulty hearing my iPad speaker and I didn’t care much for the speaker option on my iPhone. This thing is unbelievable. Crystal clear sound and has a microphone built in that I’m told is really clear. You will never, ever find a speaker like this at this price. I’m ordering more and considering giving them away as Christmas gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: This speaker may be small but it’s loud. I bought this to use in my work office but tried it out at home and I love it. I’m now going to have to buy another one for the office
